item.title: Announcement (Ghoom Guru Sakya Monastery)
item.description: Guru Sakya Monastery To His Eminence Khöndung Asanga Vajra Rinpoche, glorious protector of the doctrine and sentient beings, at the feet of your lotus throne we present you this letter.
